scripts.build: mkdir -p ../../docs/clifford-torus && browserify index.js | indexhtmlify | html-inject-meta > ../../docs/clifford-torus/index.html && cp social.jpg ../../docs/clifford-torus

html-inject-meta.name: Clifford Torus
html-inject-meta.description: A sterographic projection of Clifford torus in WebGL
html-inject-meta.author: Ricky Reusser
